title: Toronto Division X Service Results Data Dictionary
description: Comprehensive metadata for the Division X Service Results dataset

fields.description: Unique identifier for each service record
businessRules: Auto-generated sequential ID
Cannot be modified once created
Must be unique across all records

fields.description: Date when the service activity began
fields.validValues: Valid dates between 1975-01-01 and current date + 1 year

dataQuality.notes: 48 records (0.25%) have missing dates, all associated with invalid ward 66

businessRules: Must be before or equal to end_date
Cannot be more than 1 year in the future
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

fields.description: Date when the service activity was completed
fields.validValues: Valid dates between 1975-01-01 and current date + 1 year

dataQuality.notes: 48 records (0.25%) have missing dates, all associated with invalid ward 66

businessRules: Must be after or equal to start_date
Cannot be in more than 1 year in the future
Typically within 365 days of start_date

fields.description: City division responsible for the service

dataQuality.notes: Well-controlled list with only 5/6 unique values

businessRules: Must be from approved division list

fields.description: Outcome of the service activity (required field with UNKNOWN for missing values)

dataQuality.notes: Required field - null and empty values are treated as UNKNOWN

businessRules: PASS indicates successful service completion
FAIL indicates service did not meet standards
UNKNOWN used for null, empty, or pending results

fields.description: Toronto electoral ward where service was performed
businessRules: Must be valid Toronto ward (1-25)
Corresponds to official City of Toronto ward boundaries
Critical for geographic analysis and reporting

referenceData.note: Toronto reduced from 47 to 25 wards in 2018

fields.description: Estimated or actual cost of the service in Canadian dollars

dataQuality.notes: 3,612 records missing costs, all from Solid Waste Management division

businessRules: Must be positive value
Stored in Canadian dollars (CAD)
May represent estimated or actual costs
NULL indicates cost not available or not applicable

fields.description: Additional information or context about the service

dataQuality.notes: All records have this field but most are empty strings; no PII detected in samples

businessRules: Free-form text field
Should not contain personally identifiable information (PII)
fields.privacyNotes: Field has been audited for PII - none detected in current dataset

dataQualityIssues.description: 48 records have ward number 66, which doesn't exist in Toronto's 25-ward system
dataQualityIssues.recommendation: Investigate source data to determine correct ward numbers

dataQualityIssues.description: Data is 445 days old (last record from May 2024)
18.69% of records lack estimated cost values, all in Solid Waste Management division
dataQualityIssues.recommendation: Determine if costs can be imputed or if NULL is appropriate

usageNotes: This dataset contains City of Toronto Division X service results from 2000 to 2024
No personally identifiable information (PII) was detected
Cost analysis should account for missing values from Solid Waste Management division
